name: Firefighter (Ernesto Torres)
description:
Why make a game about killing, when you can make one about saving.

A game about saving cats and dogs from a building on fire.

Explore the building, extinguish fires and rescue pets.

WebGL version available and a Downloadable for Windows. 

Best played with Firefox or Chrome

Build for #GBJAM #gbjam8

Only 4 colors

Controls limited to gameboy controls

160x144 resolution
